# DataTalksClub Zoomcamp Projects Gallery

> A free, interactive dashboard to browse 2000+ past student projects from DataTalksClub online courses.

## What is this?

This is a searchable gallery of capstone projects submitted by students who completed DataTalksClub's free online courses. It helps current students find inspiration for their own projects.

## Courses Covered

- Data Engineering Zoomcamp (DE Zoomcamp) - Learn batch and streaming data pipelines with tools like Apache Airflow, Apache Kafka, Apache Spark, dbt, Docker, Terraform, and Google BigQuery
- Machine Learning Zoomcamp (ML Zoomcamp) - Build and deploy ML models using scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Keras, and Flask
- MLOps Zoomcamp - Learn ML operations including MLflow, Prefect, model monitoring, and CI/CD for ML
- LLM Zoomcamp - Build applications with large language models, RAG systems, and vector databases

## Key Features

- Filter projects by course, year, cloud provider (AWS, GCP, Azure), and deployment type
- Search project titles and descriptions
- Download filtered results as CSV
- View analytics: word clouds, frequency charts, technology trends

## Who Should Use This?

- Students taking DataTalksClub courses who need capstone project ideas
- Anyone researching data engineering or ML project examples
- Recruiters looking at student portfolios
- Educators seeking real-world project examples

## How to Access

Interactive Dashboard: https://datatalksclub-projects.streamlit.app/
Landing Page: https://dimzachar.github.io/DataTalksClub-Projects/
Source Code: https://github.com/dimzachar/DataTalksClub-Projects

## About DataTalksClub

DataTalksClub (https://datatalks.club) is a community that offers free online courses in data engineering, machine learning, and MLOps. Courses are self-paced with cohort-based deadlines for capstone projects.
